dc_title_s: New topographical map showing the railway centre of the Republic of Mexico
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures.; Shows cities, towns, villages, haciendas and ranchos, common roads, rivers, railroads in operation and railroads in construction or projected.|39 x 58 centimeters, on sheet 47 x 62 centimeters|Scale 1:250,000|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Major & Knapp Eng. Mfg. & Lith Co (New York)
